text: Thiampu ngai'n inmani chuon inleitho kha inthiangnga marwaanna omchan khat-um raliim bitkha intho eii. Moses in itho khale in-angrip kha eii. Ama'n Inthiang Maichaam-inn asaksik phakhan, Pathian in Moses diangkhan ati, “Chingnga nangdiang naminmu omchan rakip ngaikha masialleiya sakro.” Suok 25:40
